title: SoHo Ex - Physically backed NFTs
description:
Most NFTs are digital art and not backed by physical assets.

The physical shoe resale market is $6B but plagued with fraud and bots.

f6_assessments.q0: I agree with the idea of placing more value and detailed authentication on the purchase of a product. Authentication means the most to customers that  make purchase on items especially when its giving you a lot more value and valid detailed information on a product.
f6_assessments.q1: There are still so many questions to be asked eg. what happens if these brand you are reselling their items reviews for business ideas and finds a greater solution? then they are going  to cut you out of business because its their products you are reselling and now its coming with the kind of solution being offered in this proposal . if this beautiful proposal could be channeled or include  building a great brand that comes with this package then we will be looking at one mighty immerged company that brings more customer satisfaction by adding on a very valuable phase that come with purchasing of a great product.
f6_assessments.q2: First of all I will commend that there is some sort of breakdown provided with guides as to how this funding is going to go down, however I believe it will take more than this audit. if this proposal could be revisited with all  the ideas and opinions expressed put together we would definitely have a greater and better out come. there could have been more breakdown to show specifics and the loop of returns when the project is funded, figures speaks volumes and so does it impact.

f6_assessments.q0: Solid idea, using an existing business and business model, which blockchain can actually solve. Namely their taking a luxury consignment business that is fraught with counterfeiting, and minting NFTs off of the physical items which will be an authentication for the product. It makes sense and the business model immediately makes sense as a real world use case for NFTs. Furthermore since the business is already successful without NFTs, there's an existing user base to tap into.
f6_assessments.q1: Assuming the proposer represents soho exchange (https://shopatsoho.com), then this would be a not heavy lift on the development side. It would be nice to know that they have any technical resources or help, but the hardest work of building adoption and a user base has already been accomplished through their existing business. Then the NFT creation is just a process of converting existing customers, which also brings in noobs into Cardano.
f6_assessments.q2: There are some broad KPIs outlined including a community launch. It would ideally be nice to define what that is and how each step can truly be measured, but these steps are probably sufficient to be auditable for progress.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal presents a business use case tied to NFTs besides art, trying to combat frauds in the shoe market, in particular sneakers by introducing NFTs representing physical pieces
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposer has already a team combining developers and experts in the shoe industry.
The team is also putting in place the idea of a circular economy, as billions of shoes nowadays are ending up in the landfill.
A minus for having targeted the translation for Chinese. Most of Chinese are in China and if users would spend in Ada to buy the NFT I don't see it happening, as China effectively banned all crypto except the digital yuan.
I would target the Spanish translation instead.
f6_assessments.q2: The budget breakdown is clear and the money the team is asking for seems adequate for each item. I like the idea of reserving a percentage of the budget for marketing as the project needs this to succeed because it will be delivered uniquely to the Cardano community.

f6_assessments.q0: Good idea for the start of connecting physical products to users via blockchain. additional ideas how users can authenticate the products they buy
f6_assessments.q1: Documentation, timeline and implementation, clear resources. Add a diagram of the stages from buying to receiving products and the risks for buyers and sellers
f6_assessments.q2: roadmap, clear milestones with the work to be achieved. about reasonable time and cost to build a good product

solution:
We are a marketplace for products like collector's edition sneakers.

They are minted on the blockchain as NFTs, bought and resold with $ADA
experience:
Footwear Design - Luxury Activewear Brands NYC

Footwear Design - Nike HQ PDX

Brand Design & Marketing - Taipei
